transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Ma'am, hi, main Pallavi bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan, haan, ma'am, boliye.
Executive: Hi, ma'am. Actually, aapka concern aaya tha. Ma'am, Harish sir se baat hui hai kya aapki iske regarding?
Customer: Nahi, nahi. Aisa kuch bhi nahi. Sir toh bole ki mujhe kuch malum nahi hai toh directly helpline jo number hai usse baat kar le.
Executive: Okay, ma'am. Actually, aap ek baar agar laptop ke samne ho na, toh aap ek baar aa jao uske dashboard pe aa jao aap.
Customer: Hmm, abhi hu ma'am, boliye.
Executive: Aap thoda sa niche karo, dekho waha pe na aapki domain registration dikha rahi hai 2026, 4 August tak. Toh domain aapka chal raha hai as it is, thik hai? Humne na pehle maximizer service chalai thi ma'am. Toh humne na jaise sir renewal nahi karane wale the, toh Harish sir ne na maximizer ko degrade karke humne mini dynamic catalog service li thi, jo sub-domain ki service hai ma'am. Toh aapka domain toh aapke paas available hai, thik hai? Agar aap bologe toh main uska access aapko mail kara dungi. But aapki jo catalog hai na ma'am, woh sub-domain pe chal rahi hai. Matlab aapko maximizer wala benefits nahi mil payega kyunki humne service ko degrade karaya hai maximizer to mini dynamic catalog ma'am.
Customer: Ji, ji, hmm.
Executive: Thik hai? Toh usme kya problem aa rahi hai? Jaise aap keh rahi thi ki aapko kuch domain ke regarding jaanna hai?
Customer: Ma'am, jaise ki abhi ke liye domain mein kuch website vagera nahi de payenge abhi, abhi ke liye jaise jaise chal raha hai sir.
Executive: Nahi, nahi ma'am, woh hum nahi de payenge. Woh phir aapko na maximizer mein convert karana padega. Agar aap kahoge ki domain ka, dekho maximizer mein phir aapko convert hi karana padega. Services aapko isme nahi mil payegi. Like humne, acha ek baat bataiye, hamara jo 70,000 wala package tha, woh humne 28,000 mein karaya hai. Toh services mein kuch na kuch toh loss jayega hi. But phir bhi maine sir ko kaha tha ki aap use vagera kijiyega. Aur agar aap usko chahoge, agar aapko pehle wale benefits chahiye toh phir aapko services ko ma'am upgrade karna padega jisme aapko char mail ID milegi. Aur agar aap isi service mein kahoge ki mujhe ID password dila do, toh phir woh main aapko kara dungi ma'am. But ID password se IndiaMART se ma'am aap kuch bhi access nahi kar paogi kyunki aapki services hi convert ho gayi hai, aap samajhiyega please.
Customer: Okay, nahi mujhe malum nahi tha sir. Toh mujhe bataye ki tu baat kar le ek baar aur mujhe kuch pata hi nahi hai iske regarding toh.
Executive: Abhi kaha hu aap samajh pao.
Customer: Haan, main aapko thoda sa aur clear kar deti hu. Aap na waha pe dekho ek invoices wala option aa raha hoga aapke. Check karo waha pe invoices ka ek option aa raha hoga ma'am.
Customer: Dekho invoices ka option aa raha hai?
Customer: Haan, haan, ji ma'am.
Executive: Haan. Toh waha pe dekho ma'am September aur August ka na aapko invoice dikha raha hoga maximizer ka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thik hai? Humne na, haan. Toh waha pe na maximizer mein kya hota hai na ki aapki website jo sub-domain pe abhi chal rahi hai na, abhi aapki website indiamart.com ke yaha pe chal rahi hai aur pehle jo hamara chal raha tha, woh chal raha tha sapturushipharma.com karke jo abhi domain aapka available hai. Aapko domain dashboard pe dikh raha hai. Thik hai? Jo domain aap, haan, woh dikh raha hai aapko, thik hai? Toh services jab, jab tak aap maximizer mein nahi loge, IndiaMART aap maxi ke benefits ko nahi available kar paoge ma'am. Until woh maxi ki service nahi hogi toh.
Customer: Acha, acha, okay, okay. Toh ye bas problem hai ma'am. Toh Ravi ne...
Executive: Nahi, koi baat nahi. Aap ek kaam kijiyega na ma'am, agli first week ke liye na, jaise service ke regarding kyunki main kaafi din se Harish sir ko bol bhi rahi thi ki koi, koi toh person ka number dijiye jo IndiaMART use karta ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai? Haan. Toh woh hum ek kaam karte hai ki hum na usko ek baar service feed vagera ke regarding bhi baat kar lete hai first week of December mein ya so that ki apni jo service ko lekar issues aa rahi hai na, woh bhi clear ho paaye. Aur usme aapke account manager Ravi ji bhi honge ma'am.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan, abhi hu.
Executive: Haan. Thik hai? Aur ma'am, abhi na main abhi aapke phir doubts clear ho gaye na?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan ma'am, ho gaya hai.
Executive: Okay ma'am, toh main aapse ek request karungi. Abhi na main aapko ek feedback nahi bhej pa rahi hu. Please usme satisfied mein reply kar dijiyega jo doubts aapke clear ho rahe hai iske regarding.
Customer: Acha, thik hai, thik hai. Haan ma'am, kar dijiye aap.
Executive: Ma'am, please karaiyega. Aise primary number pe jayega woh aapke primary mail ID pe jayega.
Executive: Woh mail ID hai na aapke paas?
Customer: Haan, hai. Info hai mere paas hai. Abhi request jayegi matlab main, main pehle trust ke sath aapko woh bhej dungi.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, main kar dungi ma'am. Main bhi isi line par kaam kar rahi hu. Mujhe malum hai. Aap bhej dijiye. Thik hai, bhej dijiye main abhi kar dungi. Aur aap, haan ji ma'am aur aap na mera number note kar lo 720 ek baar. Harish sir ke paas bhi mera number hai.
Customer: Ek second, boliye.
Executive: Ravi ka number bhi aap le lijiyega. Main Ravi ko bolungi aapko number de dene ke liye. 72092
Customer: 72092
Executive: 92833
Customer: 833
Executive: 53. Aap na mujhe is number pe ping kar do. So ki agar aapka message ya call aaye, agar main available nahi rahu toh main Ravi ko turant bata pau ki aapko call kar paaye woh.
Customer: Acha, thik hai, okay, okay ma'am. Thik hai.
Executive: Okay. What's your name ma'am?
Customer: Rozi.
Executive: Okay. Thank you so much ma'am. Thank you.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about domain and website.

- Unable to access website in the domain.



Resolution:

- Explained about maximizer and mini dynamic catalog.

- Explained difference between maximizer and mini dynamic.

- Offered to upgrade the services.

- Executive shared her number and Ravi's number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a feedback link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- domain, website, maximizer, mini dynamic catalog
